author: cframpton
msg: First crack at scripts for windows which will combine the Apache Flex SDK with the AIR SDK, playerglobal.swc and preconfigured frameworks config files.  These may have dependencies on later versions of Windows which may need to be corrected but hard to do without requiring wget or curl for http download and an zip utility to extract the files from the packages.
